channel.title: Essays on Aditya Rachman Putra
channel.description: Recent content in Essays on Aditya Rachman Putra

item.title: Cooking and Programming
item.description: This post is was originally written in 2018 and posted in my old blog. I thought the content was quite relevant today, so I decided to put it here and edited several things to make it easier to read (believe me, the original version is less thought out than I remembered it to be ). Today I read this article in the Atlantic titled “The Why of Cooking”. At start, this article made me question myself on what it means to be able to cook.

item.title: 3 Things I learned on DevC Bandung Meetup (Pytorch)
item.description: This note is about what I learnt from FB Bandung DevC Meetup last Wednesday (2020-01-22), to be specific it is about Amajid Sinar Guntara - Jedi’s talk on using Pytorch from research to deployment. His original slide can be found on Bandung DevC Facebook Group. AS this note is about what I learnt, I may not cover all of his talk and will focus more on what interests me and also serve as my cue on what I want to learn next.
